programme.title: The Soupy Sales Show
programme.desc: Comedy for all ages.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Ultimate Cowboy: Bigger in Texas Season two of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown kicks off with the arrival of fourteen real-life cowboys to the sprawling Texas ranch where they'll call home until only one remains. As they set up camp in the sweltering heat, they make their introductions and size up the competition. While getting better acquainted, personalities clash, and alliances form. In the first of many challenges, the cowboys work in teams to sort gold-tagged cattle from a mixed herd. When miscommunication affects a team's performance, they have to answer to Trace. After consulting with two expert judges, Trace eliminates the team member who didn't pull their weight. As the eliminated contestant hits the trail, the remaining thirteen breathe a sigh of relief and prepare for the next challenge.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E6 Survivors Buck continues to grieve over Ike's untimely death. Meanwhile, Cody falls for Julia, the widow of a gunrunner who has a young son named Danny. Cody helps them both adjust to life on their own.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E23 The Deserter A wounded Army deserter shows up at the McCain Ranch desperate for a horse. Lucas takes him in just as the Army Cavalry unit appears to take the deserter into custody. In town, the harsh commanding officer demands he be executed for desertion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E24 The Vision Mark drinks some tainted water from a barrel and contracts typhoid fever. Lucas is forced to use an eccentric old doctor. During bouts of a continuous intense fever, Mark becomes delirious and has a vision of his deceased mother, who he never knew.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E25 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E2 Satonka While resting in the mountains, Cheyenne hears the cries of a man. He witnesses him falling to his death. Back in town, he learns of the fears and superstitions surrounding Satonka folklore. Cheyenne must solve the mystery.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E3 Sweet Sam Cheyenne arrives in Rock Springs. He meets Sam Pridemore, who stops a killer and becomes the town hero. He seems to be everyone's friend. But Cheyenne is suspicious, thinking he is planning to rob the bank of its gold.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E5 Saddle Up or Settle Down? Bubba, Cody, and Booger have their work cut out for them removing a dangerous cow from a local rancher’s herd. Bubba continues to shadow his father-in-law, making his first business pitch to a potential client. He begins to realize a life in Mississippi could prove to be very lucrative, but he isn’t ready to hang up his spurs just yet. Misty convinces Cody to let her have his ranch horse for her new cattle business, requiring Cody and Booger to train a replacement colt for Cody. Booger and Jaclyn find wedding planning to be more troublesome than they anticipated.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E6 Tying the Knot When a cow goes rogue and plants herself in the middle of a pond, Booger and Cody rely on their roping skills to pull her out. Bubba is feeling pressured to give up the cowboy way of life when he is offered the opportunity to take over the management of his father-in-law’s company. Misty attempts to buy cows from a notoriously tough trading-cattle owner, who also happens to be her brother-in-law. Booger and Jaclyn plan the finishing touches for their wedding, and everyone joins together to celebrate their special day.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E11 The Promoter Con man Jack Scully comes to North Fork with his friend, Reuben Miles, a simple-minded young man who is fast with a gun. Scully uses the young gun to win money by coaxing people into gunfights. Lucas becomes the next target.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E12 The Illustrator Hannah Shaw waits excitedly for New York artist Jeremiah Crowley to come to North Fork to paint her portrait. When he finally arrives, Hannah discovers he is a drunkard and is in trouble with the law. Lucas, as acting marshal, tries to help him out.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Bone War It's not gold that inspires a rush of treasure hunters to flood the windblown bluffs of Wyoming: it's bones. After stumbling upon a strange fossil, a man is caught in the crossfire of rival paleontologists warring over a trove of dinosaur bones.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E8 The Gold Rush Lawman When failed prospector John Hicks Adams is elected sheriff of Santa Clara County, he must prove that he won't be a bust as a lawman too. Just weeks into the job, his courage is tested when a band of stagecoach robbers begins terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E5 James Harrod: Kentucky's Founding Father When frontiersman James Harrod founds Harrod's Town on Native American hunting grounds in Kentucky, he soon finds his new settlement under attack. His leadership is tested as he defends the first European settlement west of the Appalachian Mountains.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E3 Sweet Sam Cheyenne arrives in Rock Springs. He meets Sam Pridemore, who stops a killer and becomes the town hero. He seems to be everyone's friend. But Cheyenne is suspicious, thinking he is planning to rob the bank of its gold.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Silent Knife Mark, a young mute boy, arrives in North Fork. When townspeople treat Mark badly because he cannot speak, Lucas and his son, Mark, befriend him. Desperate for cash, the boy steals $500 from a stagecoach line. Lucas convinces him to return the money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E14 Miss Bertie Bertie Hoakam, a lively little old lady, comes to North Fork. She tells Lucas and Micah of her plan to capture a ruthless bandit for the reward money to support herself. To everyone's surprise, she succeeds with her plan.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E3 Pinkerton Detectives Track a Killer After a bank robbery, two Pinkerton detectives join forces to track the notorious Missouri Kid. During a shootout, the Missouri Kid kills seasoned detective Charles Schumacher, leaving young George Dougherty to finish the job and avenge his death.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E8 The Many Faces of Charles Siringo Unable to apprehend the train-robbing Smith Brothers, Sheriff Doc Shores calls the Pinkerton Detective Agency for assistance. The agency sends Charles Siringo, an undercover specialist known for his unorthodox methods of capturing criminals.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E4 Mason & Dixon: Trailblazing Surveyors English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. With science and courage, they survey their famous Mason-Dixon Line with pinpoint accuracy.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E2 Lines in the Sand The thirteen remaining cowboys face their first immunity challenge that tests their individual skills. The contestants race to score the fastest time in barrel racing and calf roping. While most cowboys impress Trace and the judges, only one will be safe from the next elimination. For the team challenge, the cowboys take on a group of untrained horses that they have to break, saddle, and ride. In the end, it all comes down to strategy, and the team that thinks ahead takes the win. After a few choice words, teammates lock horns, determined to out-cowboy the other. When an unexpected cowboy heads home, the rest of the contestants realize every move they make counts in this competition.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E7 Initiation Jimmy captures Jesse's brother Frank James after a bank robbery. Jesse feels that he needs to be loyal to his brother and breaks him out of jail. This forces Teaspoon and Jimmy to go out on the hunt to bring him back in for justice.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Gunslinger
programme.desc: When a town marshal is gunned down, his wife bravely returns fire at the gunmen and kills one. The widow is named the town's temporary marshal. At her husband's funeral, she spies the second killer and plans to finish avenging her husband.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E8 Dr. Susan Anderson: Frontier Medicine Woman Freshly-graduated from medical school, Dr. Susan Anderson sets up a practice in Cripple Creek, Colorado, a rough-and-tumble mining town. At a time when only ten percent of physicians are female, Dr. Anderson faces her share of doubters and has a difficult time attracting patients in the frontier town. When miners suddenly rush into her office with an injured boy, she defies prevailing wisdom and decides to save his mangled arm instead of amputating the limb. The risks are enormous. If the boy’s arm becomes infected, and he dies, she will lose everything. Years later, Dr. Anderson relives the story while treating Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, who comes down with fever while passing through Cripple Creek.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Vaqueros Mexican bandits attack Lucas and Mark for crossing their desert without paying. The group steals their horses, kidnaps Mark, and leaves Lucas to die in the desert. Lucas gets free and trails the banditos to a small village.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E2 First Wages Against Lucas' wishes, Mark gets a job at the livery stable in town. Lucas has doubts that Mark can both work and get his chores done on time. Mark finds himself in trouble when he takes a shortcut on an errand and meets a dangerous bank robber.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E3 Sheer Terror Lucas stands guard at the North Fork Bank when $50,000 arrives in a specially designed stagecoach strongbox. Two gunmem who plan to ambush and rob the stage take Milly and Mark hostage in the general store, which doubles as their headquarters.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E4 The Stand-In Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain Ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas refuses since they are taking a murderer named Rudy Croft to be hanged in Yuma. Later, Croft escapes and the guards take Lucas as their prisoner.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E1 Anne Bailey: Horseback Heroine After Anne Bailey's husband is killed by Native Americans, she defies the social norms of the frontier and becomes a horseback courier, risking her life to race through hostile territory delivering vital supplies to isolated forts and settlements.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E10 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 1 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that endangers the town’s beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 2 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that ends the life of the town’s beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand. After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. When the judge learns there are no witnesses, however, he sets the killer free due to lack of evidence, leaving Masterson with a moral dilemma. Does he seek revenge or await the s

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S5 E2 Counterfeit Gun Cheyenne is guarding a gold shipment on a train. A gang robs the train and shoots a man dead. Before he passes away, the man names Cheyenne as the gang's leader. Cheyenne must clear his name.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E5 Tension Lucas and Mark help Sid Halpern with his cattle drive. When bounty hunter Clemmie Martin confronts Halpern and gunfire erupts, Halpern and Martin both perish. Lucas tries to hide Halpern's criminal past from his widow and son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E6 Eddie's Daughter Eddie Halstead is a hotel clerk in North Fork. His daughter, Lillian, who he hasn't seen since childhood, arrives in town. She is now a dance hall girl and Lucas discovers criminals are following her, focused on the stolen money in her possession.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: In 1866, the Reno Brothers gang is ravaging Indiana. When a detective agency sends a man to infiltrate the gang by posing as an outlaw, he sets a trap to capture the gang during an early-morning train robbery.

programme.title: Gunslinger
programme.desc: When a town marshal is gunned down, his wife bravely returns fire at the gunmen and kills one. The widow is named the town's temporary marshal. At her husband's funeral, she spies the second killer and plans to finish avenging her husband.

programme.desc: S1 E11 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 2 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial “line in the sand.” South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this “dead line” with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that ends the life of the town’s beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand. After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. When the judge learns there are no witnesses, however, he sets the killer free due to lack of evidence, leaving Masterson with a moral dilemma. Does he seek revenge or await the s

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S5 E2 Counterfeit Gun Cheyenne is guarding a gold shipment on a train. A gang robs the train and shoots a man dead. Before he passes away, the man names Cheyenne as the gang's leader. Cheyenne must clear his name.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E5 Tension Lucas and Mark help Sid Halpern with his cattle drive. When bounty hunter Clemmie Martin confronts Halpern and gunfire erupts, Halpern and Martin both perish. Lucas tries to hide Halpern's criminal past from his widow and son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E6 Eddie's Daughter Eddie Halstead is a hotel clerk in North Fork. His daughter, Lillian, who he hasn't seen since childhood, arrives in town. She is now a dance hall girl and Lucas discovers criminals are following her, focused on the stolen money in her possession.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: In 1866, the Reno Brothers gang is ravaging Indiana. When a detective agency sends a man to infiltrate the gang by posing as an outlaw, he sets a trap to capture the gang during an early-morning train robbery.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Talisman After a priest contacts Teaspoon for help, he takes the riders on a mission to save a village of farmers being terrorized by ruthless bandits who want their silver. Meanwhile, Buck helps protect a woman from a man that has an infatuation with her.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E3 Lou Mallory Lou Mallory, a beautiful red-headed lady, arrives in North Fork and quickly buys property, including Milly Scott's general store. Lucas learns she is quite the businesswoman, until she gets into trouble.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E4 Quiet Night, Deadly Night A stagecoach arrives in North Fork carrying two women, one of whom is gravely ill. Doc Burrage believes it's smallpox. Lou Mallory, Lucas, and both passengers quarantine alongside with another rider, Lee Coyle, a dangerous outlaw.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Great Train Robbery Bat Masterson, former gunfighter and sheriff, is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the story behind one of the country’s greatest train robberies. Although Butch and Sundance are long gone, Masterson tracks down Sundance’s former girlfriend, Etta Place, to draw out more details. To pull off the audacious robbery, they used official Union Pacific lanterns to signal the train and fool the engineer into believing a bridge was out. As Etta reluctantly relives the events of the robbery and its aftermath, it’s obvious that she is still smitten by Sundance after all of these years.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Legend of the Blue-Eyed Apache When eleven-year-old Herman Lehmann is torn away from his frontier home by an Apache raiding party, he must adapt in order to survive. He soon forgets the life he unwillingly left behind and is adopted by an Apache family. For close to a decade, he lives as a Native American, learning their language and customs. Eventually, he even joins the same type of raiding party that separated him from his family. Though the years pass by, Herman’s mother never gives up hope that she will be reunited with her son. One day, she hears a rumor of a “blue-eyed Apache” now living on a reservation. Could this be her long-lost son? Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Herman’s mother to uncover the real story of the blue-eyed Apache.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Savannah Sunrise
programme.desc: Joy Miles thinks she's taking a simple road trip to move her mother-in-law, Loraine, from Louisville to Savannah. Complete opposites, the two women manage to tolerate each other - barely. Type A+ personality, Joy is consumed with a high-stakes project at work. She has her days scheduled to the second. Now widowed, free-spirited Loraine is moving to a retirement community, no longer a preacher's wife, but a woman on her own. Her insights about life and family get under Joy's skin, challenging Joy to take a hard look at her whirlwind career and her priorities. As the weekend unfolds, with its outrageous adventures, hilarious encounters and heart-to-heart revelations, the women come to see each other through new eyes, and both women make an astounding discovery: they need each other more than they know.

programme.title: Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: A homesteading family in 1867 Wyoming faces a crisis when the husband is killed and the wife must decide whether to remain or take her son and daughter back East.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E3 End of a Young Gun A young outlaw named Will Fulton saves Mark's life but breaks a leg in the process. He mends at Lucas' ranch, and there meets the lovely Ann Bard. The outlaw begins to soften and reassesses his choices and path in life.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Marshal Micah Torrance, formerly a famous marshal, who is now a drunk crippled from a gunfight, stumbles into North Fork. Lucas McCain hires him in hopes of rehabilitating the man. The good deed quickly backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E3 End of a Young Gun A young outlaw named Will Fulton saves Mark's life but breaks a leg in the process. He mends at Lucas' ranch, and there meets the lovely Ann Bard. The outlaw begins to soften and reassesses his choices and path in life.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Marshal Micah Torrance, formerly a famous marshal, who is now a drunk crippled from a gunfight, stumbles into North Fork. Lucas McCain hires him in hopes of rehabilitating the man. The good deed quickly backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E7 All for One or One for Himself Booger and Jaclyn enjoy a romantic beach getaway for their honeymoon and discuss their new life together. Misty and Cody contemplate a business partnership. To celebrate their anniversary, Bubba and Kaley take a trip to Mississippi, and Bubba begins to warm up to the idea of relocating there permanently to work with Kaley’s father. However, Bubba’s reluctance to tell Booger and Cody about the job offer from his father-in-law causes tensions to boil over, leaving the future of their business, and their friendship, uncertain.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E8 Happy Trails Booger and Cody struggle to pen two bulls in need of a veterinary check-up. Cody gets soaked when he fails to heed Booger’s prediction of a rainstorm, sparking Booger to try his hand at delivering the local weather forecast. Bubba decides to accept the job with his father-in-law in Mississippi and he makes a handmade gift for Cody and Booger to soften the blow when he breaks the news to them. The trio takes on one last big job to benefit a neighbor in need. Bubba and Kaley host a final cookout before they pack up and leave for Mississippi.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E15 Six Years and a Day Mrs. Marston is in dire need of a doctor after problems arise as she is giving birth. Mark and Lucas try to help but they need Doc Burrage, who is out of town. More problems come when two men arrive at the McCain Ranch intent on killing the doctor.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E16 Flowers by the Door Lucas is helping Cora Seevers mend a broken fence when Micah rides up to tell them about a murder nearby. The only clue at the scene is a pack of flower seeds. Lucas discovers that a sly book salesman offering free seeds to his victims is to blame.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
programme.desc: A boy enchanted with tales from the Old West unlocks a mystery that could save their family farm. While his widowed mother struggles to avoid foreclosure, a mysterious stranger arrives looking for a room to rent. A bond with the boy grows as the drifter recounts breathtaking stories of Shooter Green, a legendary gunslinger accused of Arizona's biggest gold robbery. The truth is revealed, along with the secret of the drifter's past when a crooked lawman appears, hot on the trail of the stolen gold. Past and present collide in this tale of action, adventure and drama. Stars Adam Baldwin (The Last Ship, Full Metal Jacket, The Patriot), Jeremy Sumpter (Peter Pan, Soul Surfer), Jill Wagner (Braven, Christmas Cookies), and Jet Jurgensmeyer (Last Man Standing, American Sniper).

programme.title: Far Haven
programme.desc: In 1887, Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven, Arizona to start over with his two young children, but when his father-in-law is brutally attacked he must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Annie MacGregor Story While on the trail, Annie MacGregor and her Scottish family's wagon wheel breaks. The family patriarch doesn't want any help until Major Adams' wagon train stops. Conflict arises when they practice their traditions, including playing bagpipes.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E27 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 The Prodigal A bank robber hides at the McCain Ranch and takes Lucas and Mark hostage. Problems arise when the gunman's mother shows up, believing he owns the ranch and Mark is her grandson. The truth comes out when more gunmen arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E30 The Fourflusher Sharecropper Gabe Fenway enters his horse, Sapphire, in a race. His landlord, Jake Preston, bets Fenway that Mark's horse, Blueboy, will win. Preston wants Fenway's farm and bets $1000 against his whole year of crops. He will stop at nothing to win.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E4 Man Alone Cheyenne finds a young, injured cowboy who is suffering from amnesia. Cheyenne takes him to the doctor and then leaves to investigate a murder and bank robbery. Cheyenne suspects that the young man could be involved.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E5 The Quick and the Deadly On his stop to pick up prisoners for Huntsville, Cheyenne learns of Deputy Gary Thomas' conviction of a crime. He believes that the banker's son, Jud Ainley is behind Thomas' arrest and begins unraveling the truth.
